trans-unit.source: Contains arguments for the <xref href="System.Windows.DataObject"></xref>.<xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> event.
The <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste as, but before the data is actually pasted.
Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs> object is typically created by the application that is initiating the paste operation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.DataObject"></xref> containing the data to be pasted.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether the paste is part of a drag-and-drop operation.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the paste is part of a drag-and-drop operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
If this parameter is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> event is fired on drop.
A string specifying the preferred data format to use for the paste operation.
See the <xref href="System.Windows.DataFormats"></xref> class for a set of predefined data formats.
Raised when dataObject or formatToApply is **null**.
Raised when formatToApply specifies a data format that is not present in the data object specified by dataObject.
Gets or sets a suggested <xref href="System.Windows.DataObject"></xref> to use for the paste operation.
Initially this property contains a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> that is identical to that stored in the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject%2A> property.
Custom pasting event handlers can specify a new suggested <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> to paste by setting this property.

A <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> stored in this property must have at least one data format, the first of which is automatically applied to the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.FormatToApply%2A> property when this property is set.
The currently suggested <xref href="System.Windows.DataObject"></xref> to use for the paste operation.
Getting this value returns the currently suggested <xref href="System.Windows.DataObject"></xref> for the paste operation.
Setting this value specifies a new suggested <xref href="System.Windows.DataObject"></xref> to use for the paste operation.
Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to a data object that contains no data formats.
Gets or sets a string specifying the suggested data format to use for the paste operation.
A string specifying the suggested data format to use for the paste operation.
Getting this value returns the currently suggested data format to use for the paste operation.
Setting this value specifies a new suggested data format to use for the paste operation.
Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to a data format that is not present in the data object referenced by the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.DataObject*> property.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets a copy of the original data object associated with the paste operation.
A copy of the original data object associated with the paste operation.
